keyword: how many calories are in a small avocado
title: How Many Calories Are in a Small Avocado?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a small avocado, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, fiber, and healthy fat details for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Small Avocado?
assumptions: Small avocado (~100 g edible flesh), raw, pitted and peeled; no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety (e.g., Hass), ripeness, growing conditions, and portion size. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A small avocado provides about 160 kcal, mostly from healthy monounsaturated fats.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Use a medium avocado (~136 g edible)

faqs.q: How many calories are in a small avocado?
faqs.a: Approximately 160 kcal for one small avocado's edible portion.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in a small avocado?
faqs.a: About 15 g total fat, with 2.1 g saturated; mostly heart-healthy fats.

faqs.q: Does a small avocado have a lot of fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, around 6.7 g of dietary fiber, supporting digestion.
Net carbs are low (~1.8 g after fiber) with 8.5 g total carbs.

faqs.q: How does avocado size affect calories?
faqs.a: Small (~100 g) is 160 kcal; medium adds ~60 kcal, large even more.
